ygData.subject: Re: Fear and level 16 spell questions
ygData.msgSnippet: On elementals, If you are talking of fire elem like the ones I hunt in lavastorm, you re mistaken. They deal most damage by the fire shield they cast on
ygData.messageBody:
On elementals,

If you are talking of fire elem like the ones I hunt in lavastorm, you're
mistaken. They deal most damage by the fire shield they cast on themsleves
(the message 'youre burned'). And guess what, we may have the right line of
spells for this very purpose. Added bonus, this spell does not register yet
as aggressive. It works just fine on gnoll shamans too as my deear departed
rexx would say.

Ibnabeth
Karana

At 13:52 28/06/1999 -0700, you wrote:
>From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
>It's my understanding that quickness now lasts 5 minutes. Just cast it
>on yourself and start a stop watch.
>
>I use the fear strategy on things that hit too hard, like elementals.
>For their level they pound harder than you would expect. I keep memory
>blur memorized, too, so that I can get rid of any extra beasties that
>frenzy as my feared target runs by. Obvioulsy this is only effective
>in areas where you know the terrain and know that you can handle
>anything that comes along, as an individual anyway. Mesmerizing a
>frenzy candidate and then bluring it after you pass by will keep you
>out of harm's way.
>
>If all hell breaks loose you should have a few seconds before the
>frezied beasts kill your pet. Use that time to Gate because invis will
>do no good.
>
>Q
>
>--- Scott Murawski <scott@...> wrote:
>> From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>
>>
>> >From: jcent@...
>> >
>> >So the question is
>> >Suppose I fear a wisp and I have a pet. If I just
>> stand where I am and not
>> >follow, will my pet following the wisp cause a
>> train if wisps are in the
>> >area?
>> >
>> >>Probably so....they will attack your pet first,
>> then you...beware.
>>
>> Yeah, thats what I figured. Thats why I haven't
>> been casting it.
>> Thanks for confirmation
>>
>> >>Yes, requires a lot of mana....save it for the
>> main tank in your
>> >group....and cast only after melee starts....it
>> doesn't last long...maybe 2
>> >or 3 minutes...
>>
>> WOAH, I was getting the impression it only lasted 30
>> seconds or something
>> like that.
>> Two or 3 minutes is way longer than I thought.
>>
>> >>requires Cats Eye Agate...about 2g each
>>
>> Could get expensive...
>>
>> --------
>>
>> I've been hunting in black burrow and kerra isle.
>> Now, when I get to level
>> 15, I won't get much in the way
>> of experience. Is there a zone near black burrow
>> which is good to hunt at
>> 15 and up?
>>
>> Also, it took around 60 plat to get my main level 12
>> spells. How much is
>> the estimate to get your main level 16 spells?
>> Since I'm on the topic of
>> plat, are there any zones near black burrow which
>> aren't incredibly
>> dangeous (like bb) which give good loot so I can
>> withstand the onslaught of
>> plat comming out of my bank?
>>
>> Thanks
>>
>> Azboklin the enchanter
>>
>>
